text:
Resolver | Javascript Developer | Toronto, Canada | Full-Time, On-Site | http://www.resolver.com/about-us/careers/?p=job%2Foap94fww

Resolver is looking for an experienced Full Stack Developer responsible for the development of the Resolver Core Platform. Growing rapidly, this innovative software and services company is looking to hire a Javascript enthusiast who can come in and hit the ground running in our downtown Toronto office.

Experience: 3+ years as a Full Stack Developer, React/Redux or any modern front end framework, AWS web application architecture, SQL
